title: HAP 52 - Great White North - Emigration to Canada
itunes:title: HAP 52 - Great White North - Emigration to Canada
description: Mary Ann Shadd and Samuel Ringgold Ward reflect on what Canada can offer African Americans, differing on the problem of racism.
